title: Should Biden Continue Deferring Student Loan Repayments?
sub_head: Students discuss proposals for canceling college debt.
body: Editor’s note: In this Future View, students discuss if President Biden should defer student debt. Next week we’ll ask, “Which is a greater threat to Jews in America: anti-Semitism of the left, or anti-Semitism of the right?” Students should click here to submit opinions of fewer than 250 words before Jan. 25. The best responses will be published that night.
